alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 1:47AM MST until January 21 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...A mix of snow, rain, and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch with a glaze of ice accumulation. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass, and Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Sidewalks and roads, especially mountain passes, bridges, and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
